SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Conduct a multi-agent conflict-oriented debate to derive investment and operational strategies that maximize grid resilience during compound extreme weather events.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: 1. Generation mix, transmission constraints, demand response, and distributed storage. 2. Maintenance scheduling and crew logistics under adverse conditions. 3. Concrete stress scenarios and regulatory constraints. 4. English-only output with PCG enforcement and detailed ratings/cross-evaluation. 5. Dual Output and Verification Report mandatory.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Debates (N=4) with Step 3A (Conflict). At least 2 rounds with divergence ratings and compromise synthesis.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: 1. Require numeric ratings (1-10), cross-evaluation each round, and explicit compromise proposals. 2. Strict XML-only format, no leading spaces/HTML entities. 3. PCG enforcement and MSV pre-checks. 4. Dual Output and Verification Report required. 5. Provide ranked portfolio of actions with cost/benefit/risk and operational triggers.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Verification: Checks: pcg_compliance, xml_validity, objective_match, no_undeclared_assumptions; meta as usual.
